name: Foundations of Faith
description: A basic plan to understand the core principles of Christianity.

readings.title: The Importance of Faith
readings.prompt: Understand what faith is and why it's essential for a relationship with God.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for increased faith.

readings.title: Finding Peace in God
readings.prompt: Discover how to experience God's peace in the midst of life's challenges.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for God's peace to guard your heart and mind.

readings.title: Trusting God's Promises
readings.prompt: Learn to rely on God's faithfulness and the promises in His Word.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for the ability to trust God's plan for your life.

readings.title: Worship and Sacrifice
readings.prompt: Explore what true worship looks like and the sacrifice of praise.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for a heart of worship and thankfulness.

readings.title: Living a New Life
readings.prompt: Think about how salvation transforms our lives and actions.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for guidance and strength to live a life pleasing to God.

readings.title: Living a Holy Life
readings.prompt: Understand the call to holiness and how to pursue it with God's help.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for God's strength to live a life set apart for Him.

name: Journey Through the Gospels
description: Follow the life and teachings of Jesus as recorded in the Gospels.

readings.title: The Birth of Jesus
readings.prompt: Reflect on the significance of Jesus' humble birth.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for humility and gratitude for Jesus' arrival.

readings.title: The Miracles of Jesus
readings.prompt: Consider the power and compassion displayed in Jesus' miracles.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for faith to believe in God's power in your life.

readings.title: The Sermon on the Mount
readings.prompt: Meditate on the counter-cultural teachings of Jesus.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for strength to live out the Beatitudes.

readings.title: Parables and Teachings
readings.prompt: Explore the wisdom and insights found in Jesus' parables.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for wisdom to understand and apply Jesus' teachings.

readings.title: The Crucifixion
readings.prompt: Reflect on the sacrifice Jesus made on the cross.
readings.prayerFocus: Thank Jesus for His atoning sacrifice.

readings.title: The Resurrection
readings.prompt: Consider the hope and power of Jesus' resurrection.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for the power of the resurrection to be evident in your life.

readings.title: The Great Commission
readings.prompt: Think about your role in sharing the good news of Jesus.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for opportunities and boldness to share your faith.

name: Strength for the Soul
description: Find encouragement and strength through passages of hope and comfort.

readings.title: God is Our Refuge
readings.prompt: Find comfort in the truth that God is a safe place in times of trouble.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for peace and trust in God during difficult times.

readings.title: Hope in the Lord
readings.prompt: Meditate on the strength that comes from waiting on the Lord.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for renewed strength and perseverance.

readings.title: God's Promises
readings.prompt: Reflect on the faithfulness of God and His promises.
readings.prayerFocus: Thank God for His faithfulness and cast your anxieties on Him.

name: 7-Day Forgiveness Focus
description: Experience the freedom of forgiveness through reflection and Scripture.

readings.title: God’s Forgiveness
readings.prompt: Receive God’s mercy today.
readings.prayerFocus: Thank God for forgiveness.

readings.title: Forgive Others
readings.prompt: Release resentment.
readings.prayerFocus: Ask for a forgiving heart.

readings.title: Forgive Yourself
readings.prompt: God has forgiven you—have you?
readings.prayerFocus: Accept God’s grace.

readings.title: The Power of the Cross
readings.prompt: Jesus paid it all.
readings.prayerFocus: Thank Jesus for His sacrifice.

readings.title: Letting Go
readings.prompt: Who are you holding a grudge against?
readings.prayerFocus: Pray to let go fully.

readings.title: Restore Relationships
readings.prompt: Reach out to reconcile.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for peace and restoration.

readings.title: Live Forgiven
readings.prompt: Walk in the freedom of grace.
readings.prayerFocus: Celebrate being free.

name: 7-Day Gratitude Challenge
description: Cultivate a heart of thankfulness by recognizing God’s blessings every day.

readings.title: Count Your Blessings
readings.prompt: List five blessings from today.
readings.prayerFocus: Thank God for His provision.

readings.title: Thankful for Relationships
readings.prompt: Reflect on the people God has placed in your life.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray gratitude for friends and family.

readings.title: Appreciate Nature
readings.prompt: Notice God’s creation around you.
readings.prayerFocus: Thank God for the beauty of creation.

readings.title: Gratitude in Trials
readings.prompt: Recall a challenging time and how God helped you.
readings.prayerFocus: Thank God for His faithfulness.

readings.title: Express Your Thanks
readings.prompt: Write a thank-you note to someone.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for a grateful spirit.

readings.title: Praise with Music
readings.prompt: Sing or listen to a song of gratitude.
readings.prayerFocus: Praise God joyfully.

readings.title: Live with a Thankful Heart
readings.prompt: Commit to daily gratitude practice.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for an ongoing grateful heart.

name: 14-Day Faith Builder Challenge
description: Strengthen your trust and walk with God through daily reflections and bold faith actions.

readings.title: Faith Over Fear
readings.prompt: Reflect on what fears God is calling you to release.
readings.prayerFocus: Ask God to replace fear with faith.

readings.title: Walking by Faith
readings.prompt: Consider areas in life where God is asking you to step out in faith.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for courage to walk in faith.

readings.title: God is Faithful
readings.prompt: Recall how God has been faithful in your past.
readings.prayerFocus: Thank God for His unwavering faithfulness.

readings.title: Faith in the Storm
readings.prompt: How can you trust God in a current challenge?
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for peace and trust during trials.

readings.title: The Shield of Faith
readings.prompt: How can you use your faith as protection today?
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for strong defense against doubt.

readings.title: Faith That Moves Mountains
readings.prompt: What is your ‘mountain’ right now?
readings.prayerFocus: Ask God for unwavering belief.

readings.title: Living by Faith
readings.prompt: What does living by faith look like in your daily habits?
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for daily faith-filled choices.

readings.title: Faith Tested & Refined
readings.prompt: How is God refining your faith?
readings.prayerFocus: Ask God to grow your perseverance.

readings.title: Faith that Pleases God
readings.prompt: How are you actively pleasing God with your faith?
readings.prayerFocus: Pray to live in a way that delights God.

readings.title: Faith Through Action
readings.prompt: What action is your faith calling you to take?
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for boldness to act.

readings.title: Fixing Our Eyes on Jesus
readings.prompt: Where is your focus today?
readings.prayerFocus: Ask God to center your heart on Jesus.

readings.title: Strong in the Lord
readings.prompt: How can God’s strength support your faith today?
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for strength through Christ.

readings.title: Faith in God’s Timing
readings.prompt: Where do you need patience in your faith journey?
readings.prayerFocus: Pray to trust God’s perfect timing.

readings.title: Faith for the Future
readings.prompt: What dreams or hopes are you trusting God with?
readings.prayerFocus: Thank God for a hopeful future.

name: 10-Day Christian Leadership Challenge
description: Grow as a servant-leader through Scriptural insights and daily applications.

readings.title: Servant Leadership
readings.prompt: How can you serve those you lead today?
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for a heart of service.

readings.title: Leading with Wisdom
readings.prompt: Where do you need wisdom in leadership?
readings.prayerFocus: Ask for God’s guidance in decisions.

readings.title: Humble Leadership
readings.prompt: How can humility strengthen your leadership?
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for a humble spirit.

readings.title: Integrity Matters
readings.prompt: Where is your integrity being tested?
readings.prayerFocus: Ask God for uprightness in all things.

readings.title: Lead by Example
readings.prompt: What example are you setting today?
readings.prayerFocus: Pray to lead in word and deed.

readings.title: Strength in Weakness
readings.prompt: How is God using your weakness?
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for God’s power in your weakness.

readings.title: Vision from God
readings.prompt: What vision has God given you to lead?
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for clarity and boldness.

readings.title: Lead with Love
readings.prompt: How can love shape your leadership today?
readings.prayerFocus: Ask God for a loving heart.

readings.title: Empowering Others
readings.prompt: Who can you empower or mentor today?
readings.prayerFocus: Pray to invest in others.

readings.title: Leading for God’s Glory
readings.prompt: Are your leadership goals God-centered?
readings.prayerFocus: Commit your leadership to God’s glory.

name: The Book of John
description: Read through the entire Gospel of John to understand the life and divinity of Jesus Christ.

readings.title: The Word Became Flesh
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 1 and reflect on the identity of Jesus as the Word and the Lamb of God.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for a deeper understanding of who Jesus is.

readings.title: The Wedding at Cana
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 2. Consider Jesus' first miracle and His authority.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for faith to see Jesus' power in your own life.

readings.title: Born Again
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 3. Meditate on Jesus' conversation with Nicodemus and the meaning of being born again.
readings.prayerFocus: Thank God for the gift of salvation and new life through His Son.

readings.title: The Woman at the Well
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 4. Reflect on how Jesus breaks down social barriers to offer living water.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for opportunities to share the hope of Jesus with others.

readings.title: Authority of the Son
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 5. Consider the authority Jesus has from the Father.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for submission to Jesus' authority in all areas of your life.

readings.title: Bread of Life
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 6. Meditate on Jesus' teaching that He is the Bread of Life who provides eternal satisfaction.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray to find your ultimate satisfaction and sustenance in Jesus alone.

readings.title: Rivers of Living Water
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 7. Reflect on Jesus' promise of the Holy Spirit.
readings.prayerFocus: Ask the Holy Spirit to fill and guide you today.

readings.title: The Light of the World
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 8. Consider Jesus' claim to be the Light of the World and what it means to walk in the light.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray to walk in truth and freedom from the darkness of sin.

readings.title: The Blind Man Sees
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 9. Reflect on the contrast between physical and spiritual blindness.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for spiritual eyes to see Jesus more clearly.

readings.title: The Good Shepherd
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 10. Meditate on the relationship between the Good Shepherd and His sheep.
readings.prayerFocus: Thank Jesus for His guidance, protection, and sacrificial love.

readings.title: The Resurrection and the Life
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 11. Consider the power of Jesus over death in the raising of Lazarus.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for a stronger faith in the hope of the resurrection.

readings.title: Anointing at Bethany
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 12. Reflect on Mary's act of worship and the Triumphal Entry.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for a heart that extravagantly worships Jesus.

readings.title: The Servant's Heart
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 13. Consider Jesus' example of servanthood in washing the disciples' feet.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for a humble heart to serve others as Jesus did.

readings.title: The Way, the Truth, and the Life
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 14. Meditate on Jesus' promises of peace and the Holy Spirit.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for peace in your heart, trusting that Jesus is the only way to the Father.

readings.title: Abiding in the Vine
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 15. Reflect on the importance of remaining connected to Jesus to bear fruit.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray to abide in Christ daily and to bear much fruit for His glory.

readings.title: The Work of the Holy Spirit
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 16. Consider the role of the Holy Spirit in our lives.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray to be more sensitive and responsive to the Holy Spirit's guidance.

readings.title: Jesus' High Priestly Prayer
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 17. Reflect on what Jesus prays for His followers.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for unity among believers, for which Jesus prayed.

readings.title: Betrayal and Arrest
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 18. Consider Jesus' sovereignty even in His arrest.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for strength and faithfulness in times of trial.

readings.title: The Crucifixion
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 19. Meditate on the profound sacrifice Jesus made on the cross.
readings.prayerFocus: Spend time in prayer, thanking Jesus for His atoning sacrifice for your sins.

readings.title: The Resurrection
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 20. Reflect on the empty tomb and Jesus' appearances to His disciples.
readings.prayerFocus: Rejoice and pray with a heart full of hope because of the resurrection of Jesus.

readings.title: Breakfast by the Sea
readings.prompt: Read John chapter 21. Consider Jesus' restoration of Peter and the call to 'feed His sheep.'
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for God to show you how you can serve Him and care for others.

name: The Book of Psalms (Part 1)
description: Read through the first 30 Psalms, a collection of praises, prayers, and laments.

readings.title: The Two Ways
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 1. Reflect on the path of the righteous versus the wicked.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for wisdom to delight in God's law and follow His path.

readings.title: The Reign of the LORD's Anointed
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 2. Consider God's sovereignty over all nations.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for world leaders and for God's will to be done on earth.

readings.title: You Are a Shield for Me
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 3. Find comfort in God as your protector in times of trouble.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for God's protection over you and your loved ones.

readings.title: Answer Me When I Call
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 4. Reflect on finding peace and trust in God at the end of the day.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for a peaceful heart and restful sleep, trusting in God's care.

readings.title: Lead Me, O LORD
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 5. Consider God's hatred of sin and His love for the righteous.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for guidance and a desire to live a righteous life.

readings.title: O LORD, Heal Me
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 6. Reflect on turning to God in times of personal suffering and distress.
readings.prayerFocus: Bring your personal pains and sorrows to God in prayer, asking for His healing and mercy.

readings.title: My Refuge in the LORD
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 7. Consider God as a righteous judge who defends the innocent.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for justice in situations of unfairness and trust God to be your defender.

readings.title: How Majestic Is Your Name
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 8. Marvel at the glory of God in creation and the honor He has given to mankind.
readings.prayerFocus: Spend time in praise, adoring God for His majestic creation.

readings.title: I Will Give Thanks
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 9. Reflect on praising God for His justice and help.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray with thanksgiving for God's righteous acts in your life and in the world.

readings.title: Why, O LORD, Do You Stand Afar Off?
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 10. Cry out to God about the injustice and arrogance of the wicked.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for the oppressed and for God to act against injustice.

readings.title: In the LORD I Take Refuge
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 11. Trust in God's sovereignty even when it seems evil is prevailing.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for unwavering faith in God's ultimate control and justice.

readings.title: Help, LORD
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 12. A prayer for help in a faithless generation.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for the preservation of truth and faithfulness in your community and church.

readings.title: How Long, O LORD?
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 13. A lament that turns to trust in God's steadfast love.
readings.prayerFocus: Be honest with God about your struggles and feelings of abandonment, but conclude with trust.

readings.title: The Fool Says, 'There Is No God'
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 14. Reflect on the universal nature of sin and the hope of salvation.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for a greater awareness of your own need for God's grace and salvation.

readings.title: Who Shall Dwell on Your Holy Hill?
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 15. Consider the character of a person who lives in fellowship with God.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for God to cultivate a character of integrity and righteousness in you.

readings.title: You Are My Lord
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 16. Reflect on finding ultimate satisfaction and security in God alone.
readings.prayerFocus: Declare your allegiance to God and find your joy in His presence.

readings.title: Hide Me in the Shadow of Your Wings
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 17. A prayer for protection from those who do evil.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for God's protection and for your heart to remain fixed on Him.

readings.title: I Love You, O LORD, My Strength
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 18. A powerful testimony of God's deliverance.
readings.prayerFocus: Recount God's faithfulness and deliverances in your own life with thanksgiving.

readings.title: The Heavens Declare the Glory of God
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 19. Marvel at how God reveals Himself through creation and His Word.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray that the words of your mouth and the meditation of your heart would be pleasing to God.

readings.title: May the LORD Answer You
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 20. A prayer for the king's success in battle, trusting in God, not in chariots.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for your leaders, and place your trust in God's power, not human strength.

readings.title: In Your Strength the King Rejoices
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 21. A song of thanksgiving for victory given by God.
readings.prayerFocus: Give thanks to God for the victories and blessings He has given you.

readings.title: My God, My God, Why Have You Forsaken Me?
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 22. A messianic psalm of suffering and ultimate vindication, quoted by Jesus on the cross.
readings.prayerFocus: Reflect on the suffering of Christ on your behalf and the victory that followed.

readings.title: The LORD Is My Shepherd
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 23. Find deep comfort and peace in God's loving care and guidance.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray with confidence, knowing the Lord is your shepherd who provides for all your needs.

readings.title: Who Shall Ascend the Hill of the LORD?
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 24. A psalm about the King of Glory entering His temple.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for a clean heart and pure hands to worship the King of Glory.

readings.title: To You, O LORD, I Lift Up My Soul
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 25. An acrostic prayer for guidance, deliverance, and forgiveness.
readings.prayerFocus: Humbly ask God for His guidance and mercy in your life.

readings.title: Vindicate Me, O LORD
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 26. A prayer of integrity and trust.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for a heart of integrity and a desire to walk in God's truth.

readings.title: The LORD Is My Light and My Salvation
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 27. A declaration of confident faith in the face of fear.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for courage and to trust in God's protection and deliverance.

readings.title: The Voice of the LORD
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 28. A cry for help that turns into praise for answered prayer.
readings.prayerFocus: Bring your requests to God and praise Him in faith for hearing you.

readings.title: Ascribe to the LORD Glory
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 29. A psalm celebrating the powerful and majestic voice of God in the storm.
readings.prayerFocus: Worship God for His power and majesty revealed in nature.

readings.title: I Will Extol You, O LORD
readings.prompt: Read Psalm 30. A song of thanksgiving for deliverance from death and sorrow.
readings.prayerFocus: Thank God for turning your mourning into dancing and for His faithfulness.

name: The Story of Creation
description: A detailed, verse-by-verse reading of Genesis chapter 1, reflecting on the power and majesty of God's creative work.

readings.title: The Beginning (Gen 1:1-5)
readings.prompt: Read Genesis 1:1-5. Reflect on God creating light out of darkness and bringing order from chaos.
readings.prayerFocus: Praise God for His power to bring light into the darkest areas of our lives.

readings.title: The Sky Above (Gen 1:6-8)
readings.prompt: Read Genesis 1:6-8. Consider the act of separation and the creation of the expanse we call the sky.
readings.prayerFocus: Thank God for the beauty of the sky and the air we breathe.

readings.title: Land, Sea, and Vegetation (Gen 1:9-13)
readings.prompt: Read Genesis 1:9-13. Reflect on God's design in separating land and water and causing plants to grow.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray with gratitude for the food we eat and the beauty of the earth.

readings.title: Sun, Moon, and Stars (Gen 1:14-19)
readings.prompt: Read Genesis 1:14-19. Consider the purpose of the celestial bodies to mark time and seasons.
readings.prayerFocus: Worship God for the order and rhythm He has built into the universe.

readings.title: Creatures of the Sea and Sky (Gen 1:20-23)
readings.prompt: Read Genesis 1:20-23. Marvel at the diversity and life that fills the waters and the air.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for the care of God's creation and all living creatures.

readings.title: Land Animals and Humankind (Gen 1:24-31)
readings.prompt: Read Genesis 1:24-31. Reflect on the pinnacle of God's creation: humanity, made in His own image.
readings.prayerFocus: Thank God for creating you in His image and for the purpose He has for your life.

readings.title: Sabbath Rest (Gen 2:1-3)
readings.prompt: Read Genesis 2:1-3. Consider the concept of Sabbath and the importance of rest.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for the ability to rest well and to honor God with your time of rest.

name: Wise Parenting
description: A 5-day plan to find wisdom and encouragement in the journey of parenting.

readings.title: Patience in Parenting
readings.prompt: Reflect on the importance of patience and how a calm spirit can transform your home.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for a heart of patience and understanding towards your children.

readings.title: Training a Child
readings.prompt: Consider the long-term vision for your children's character and faith. What seeds are you planting today?
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for wisdom to guide your children in a way that honors God.

readings.title: The Gift of Children
readings.prompt: Meditate on the blessing that children are from the Lord. How can you cherish this gift today?
readings.prayerFocus: Thank God for the unique gift of each of your children.

readings.title: Unconditional Love
readings.prompt: Think about the characteristics of God's love and how you can model that love to your family.
readings.prayerFocus: Ask God to fill you with a love that is patient, kind, and unconditional.

readings.title: Leading by Example
readings.prompt: Your actions and words are powerful tools. How can you live out your faith diligently before your children?
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for strength to be a consistent and godly example in your home.

name: Guiding Young Hearts
description: A 5-day plan focused on the principles of raising children in faith and love.

readings.title: Nurturing with Love
readings.prompt: Consider how to bring up your children with discipline and instruction that is encouraging, not exasperating.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for a nurturing spirit that builds up your children's hearts.

readings.title: The Value of Discipline
readings.prompt: Reflect on how loving discipline leads to a harvest of righteousness and peace, even if it's difficult.
readings.prayerFocus: Ask for wisdom to apply discipline that is both effective and loving.

readings.title: Teaching God's Word
readings.prompt: Think about the importance of making the Scriptures known to your children from an early age.
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for creative and consistent ways to teach your children about God's love.

readings.title: A Legacy of Faith
readings.prompt: Consider the faith passed down through generations. What legacy of faith are you building for your family?
readings.prayerFocus: Pray for a sincere faith that will inspire your children and future generations.

readings.title: Blessing Your Children
readings.prompt: Reflect on the power of speaking words of blessing and encouragement over your children.
readings.prayerFocus: Speak a blessing over each of your children by name in your prayer time today.
